languages.text: "Это станет шагом на пути искупления былых ошибкок, элантах. Если моя жертва приблизит нас... тебя к спасению, я согласна отдаться в руки этого чудовища".

"This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."
languages.original_text: "Это станет шагом на пути искупления былых ошибкок, элантах. Если моя жертва приблизит нас... тебя к спасению, я согласна отдаться в руки этого чудовища".

traits.locale_text: "This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself to the hands of this tormentor."

"This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself to the hands of this tormentor."

"This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."

"This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."

languages.text: 「これは私の過去の過ちを償うための一歩なのだ、エランタ。私の犠牲が、我々を…あなたを救うことに近づくのならば、私はこのトーメンターへとこの身を委ねよう」
languages.original_text: "This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."

traits.locale_text: 「これは私の過去の過ちを償うための一歩なのだ、エランタ。私の犠牲が、我々を…あなたを救うことに近づくのならば、私はこのトーメンターへとこの身を委ねよう」

languages.text: “这场献祭是我弥补过错的第一步，外界人。如果我的献祭能让我们……让你离救赎更近一步，那我愿意将我自己的血肉献给这个怪物。”
languages.original_text: "This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."

traits.locale_text: “这场献祭是我弥补过错的第一步，外界人。如果我的献祭能让我们……让你离救赎更近一步，那我愿意将我自己的血肉献给这个怪物。”

languages.text: « Ce sera là un premier pas sur la voie de l'expiation de mes péchés passés, elantach. Si mon sacrifice... nous rapproche du salut, je m'abandonnerai volontiers aux mains de ce tourmenteur. »
languages.original_text: "This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sera là un premier pas sur la voie de l'expiation de mes péchés passés, elantach. Si mon sacrifice... nous rapproche du salut, je m'abandonnerai volontiers aux mains de ce tourmenteur. »

languages.text: «Este será un paso hacia expiar los errores de mi pasado, elantach. Si mi sacrificio nos... te acerca más a la salvación, me entregaré a este torturador».
languages.original_text: "This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."

traits.locale_text: «Este será un paso hacia expiar los errores de mi pasado, elantach. Si mi sacrificio nos... te acerca más a la salvación, me entregaré a este torturador».

languages.text: "Das ist ein Schritt auf dem Weg der Buße für meine vergangenen Fehler, Elantach. Wenn uns mein Opfer ... der Erlösung näher bringt, dann begebe ich mich selbst in die Hände dieses Folterers."
languages.original_text: "This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein Schritt auf dem Weg der Buße für meine vergangenen Fehler, Elantach. Wenn uns mein Opfer ... der Erlösung näher bringt, dann begebe ich mich selbst in die Hände dieses Folterers."

languages.text: "Geçmişteki hatalarımın bedelini ödemeye bir adım daha yaklaşacağım elantach. Madem fedakârlığım bizi... Kurtuluşa erdirecek, kendimi bu işkencecinin ellerine bile isteye teslim ederim."
languages.original_text: "This will be a step upon the path of atoning for the errors of my past, elantach. If my sacrifice will bring us... bring you closer to salvation, I will commit myself into the hands of this tormentor."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmişteki hatalarımın bedelini ödemeye bir adım daha yaklaşacağım elantach. Madem fedakârlığım bizi... Kurtuluşa erdirecek, kendimi bu işkencecinin ellerine bile isteye teslim ederim."
